Module com.cameronm.inventorymanager
Package com.cameronm.inventorymanager.controllers

Class PartController

java.lang.Object
com.cameronm.inventorymanager.controllers.PartController
public class PartController extends Object
The PartController class controls the logic for the Add/Modify Part window.
Since:
2023-02-02
Version:
1.0
Author:
Cameron M

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    (package private) void
    addOrModifyPart(Part part)
    The addOrModifyPart method initializes the values in each text field if a part was passed in, a null value is passed in if the add part button was pressed.
    private void
    initialize()
    The initialize method initializes the cancel button.
    (package private) void
    partTypeInHouseSelected()
    The partTypeInHouseSelected method changes the label of the provider text field to the in-house provider type.
    (package private) void
    partTypeOutsourcedSelected()
    The partTypeOutsourceSelected method changes the label of the provider text field to the outsourced provider type.
    (package private) void
    savePart(Part part)
    The savePart method uses the InventoryValidator class to check all value of the text fields to make sure they are valid, then saves a brand-new part if a null value was passed in or a part is being modified and changed to a different type.

  • Constructor Details

    • PartController

      public PartController()
      The constructor for the PartController Class

  • Method Details

    • partTypeInHouseSelected

      void partTypeInHouseSelected()
      The partTypeInHouseSelected method changes the label of the provider text field to the in-house provider type.

    • partTypeOutsourcedSelected

      void partTypeOutsourcedSelected()
      The partTypeOutsourceSelected method changes the label of the provider text field to the outsourced provider type.

    • addOrModifyPart

      void addOrModifyPart(Part part)
      The addOrModifyPart method initializes the values in each text field if a part was passed in, a null value is passed in if the add part button was pressed.
      Parameters:
      part - This is the part that is selected from the part table and is being modified or null if add part button is used

    • savePart

      void savePart(Part part)
      The savePart method uses the InventoryValidator class to check all value of the text fields to make sure they are valid, then saves a brand-new part if a null value was passed in or a part is being modified and changed to a different type. In that case, the values are copied and a new part is created.
      Parameters:
      part - this is the part to be modified, if a null value a passed in, a new part is created

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      The initialize method initializes the cancel button.
